availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Blevins Bowling, Sr. (Clay County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Clay County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Harriet McCollum Bowling in Clay County, Kentucky, in 1837. Father of Nancy Bowling, Elizabeth Bowling, Lucinda Bowling, Mahala Bowling, Susan Bowling, Mary Bowling, Eli Bowling, Franklin Bowling, James Bowling, Martha Bowling, Jason Bowling, Blevins Bowling, Jr., and Cassie Bowling. Resident of Clay County in 1850. Farmer in Clay County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, Kentucky, p. 104B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, p. 126.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Millions, p. 206B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Clay County Marriages, Film 007728054.
